Package ajbc.doodle.calendar.controllers

Class NotificationController

java.lang.Object
ajbc.doodle.calendar.controllers.NotificationController
@RequestMapping("/notifications") @RestController public class NotificationController extends Object
Handle Notification API requests
Author:
ketty

  • Method Details

    • createNotification

      @RequestMapping(method=POST) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createNotification(@RequestBody Notification notification)
      Create new notification and insert it to database and notifications queue in NotificationManager
      Parameters:
      notification - - notification to create
      Returns:
      created notification

    • createNotificationsFromList

      @RequestMapping(method=POST, path="/list") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createNotificationsFromList(@RequestBody List<Notification> notifications)
      Create new notifications from list and insert them to database and notifications queue in NotificationManager
      Parameters:
      notifications - - list of notification to create
      Returns:
      list of created notification

    • getNotificationbyId

      @RequestMapping(method=GET, path="/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getNotificationbyId(@PathVariable Integer id)
      Get notification by id
      Parameters:
      id - - notification's id
      Returns:
      notification if action succeeded, otherwise returns exception details

    • updateNotification

      @RequestMapping(method=PUT, path="/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateNotification(@RequestBody Notification notification, @PathVariable Integer id)
      Update notification in database and notifications queue in NotificationManager
      Parameters:
      notification - - notification to update
      id - - notification's id
      Returns:
      updated notification if action succeeded, otherwise returns exception details

    • updateNotificationsFromList

      @RequestMapping(method=PUT) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateNotificationsFromList(@RequestBody Map<Integer,Notification> notificationsMap)
      Update notifications in database and notifications queue in NotificationManager
      Parameters:
      notificationsMap - - map of notifications, key - notification id, value - notification.
      Returns:
      list of updated notifications if action succeeded, otherwise returns exception details

    • getNotifications

      @RequestMapping(method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getNotifications(@RequestParam Map<String,String> map)
      Get notifications list from database by parameters
      Parameters:
      map - - map of parameters , key - parameter name, value - parameter value userId and eventId : notifications of user for specific event. eventId : all notifications of event no parameters : all notifications
      Returns:
      list of notifications if action succeeded, otherwise returns exception details

    • deleteNotification

      @RequestMapping(method=DELETE, path="/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteNotification(@PathVariable Integer id, @RequestParam String deleteType)
      Delete notification from database and notification queue in NotificationManager
      Parameters:
      id - - notification's id
      deleteType - - SOFT: deactivate user. HARD: hard delete from database
      Returns:
      deleted notification if action succeeded, otherwise returns exception details

    • deleteNotificationListOfNotifications

      @RequestMapping(method=DELETE) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteNotificationListOfNotifications(@RequestBody List<Integer> ids, @RequestParam String deleteType)
      Delete list of notifications from database and notification queue in NotificationManager
      Parameters:
      ids - - id's of notifications to be deleted
      deleteType - - SOFT: deactivate user. HARD: hard delete from database
      Returns:
      deleted notifications if action succeeded, otherwise returns exception details

    • publicSigningKey

      @GetMapping(path="/publicSigningKey", produces="application/octet-stream") public byte[] publicSigningKey()

    • publicSigningKeyBase64

      @GetMapping(path="/publicSigningKeyBase64") public String publicSigningKeyBase64()

    • run

      @Scheduled(initialDelay=3000L, fixedDelay=1000000L) public void run() throws DaoException, InterruptedException
      Throws:
      DaoException
      InterruptedException
